code:
import Cookies from'js-cookie';import{client}from'./client';// url
import{householdIndex}from'../urls';// interface
// 家計簿一覧の取得
export var getAllHousehold=function getAllHousehold(id){if(!Cookies.get("_access_token")||!Cookies.get("_client")||!Cookies.get("_uid"))return;return client.get("".concat(householdIndex(id)),{headers:{"access-token":Cookies.get("_access_token")||"","client":Cookies.get("_client")||"","uid":Cookies.get("_uid")||""}});};// 家計簿月別利用金額合計の取得
export var getMonthSpendingTotal=function getMonthSpendingTotal(id,params){if(!Cookies.get("_access_token")||!Cookies.get("_client")||!Cookies.get("_uid"))return;return client.get("".concat(householdIndex(id),"/total"),{params:params,headers:{"access-token":Cookies.get("_access_token")||"","client":Cookies.get("_client")||"","uid":Cookies.get("_uid")||""}});};// 家計簿の追加
export var createHousehold=function createHousehold(id,params){if(!Cookies.get("_access_token")||!Cookies.get("_client")||!Cookies.get("_uid"))return;return client.post("".concat(householdIndex(id)),params,{headers:{"access-token":Cookies.get("_access_token")||"","client":Cookies.get("_client")||"","uid":Cookies.get("_uid")||""}});};// 家計簿詳細の取得
export var getHousehold=function getHousehold(userId,householdId){if(!Cookies.get("_access_token")||!Cookies.get("_client")||!Cookies.get("_uid"))return;return client.get("".concat(householdIndex(userId),"/").concat(householdId),{headers:{"access-token":Cookies.get("_access_token")||"","client":Cookies.get("_client")||"","uid":Cookies.get("_uid")||""}});};// 家計簿の編集
export var editHousehold=function editHousehold(userId,householdId,params){if(!Cookies.get("_access_token")||!Cookies.get("_client")||!Cookies.get("_uid"))return;return client.patch("".concat(householdIndex(userId),"/").concat(householdId),params,{headers:{"access-token":Cookies.get("_access_token")||"","client":Cookies.get("_client")||"","uid":Cookies.get("_uid")||""}});};// 家計簿の削除
export var deleteHousehold=function deleteHousehold(userId,householdId){if(!Cookies.get("_access_token")||!Cookies.get("_client")||!Cookies.get("_uid"))return;return client.delete("".concat(householdIndex(userId),"/").concat(householdId),{headers:{"access-token":Cookies.get("_access_token")||"","client":Cookies.get("_client")||"","uid":Cookies.get("_uid")||""}});};
